reviews.name: Julia
reviews.comments: Everything very good, delivery on time

reviews.name: Aline
reviews.comments: I do not recommend. The filling is just a cream, has no shrimp and no meat

reviews.name: Renata
reviews.comments: It was not very pleasant to our tastebuds, and me and my hubby the other day went super bad. It may have been something else, but ...

reviews.name: Renata
reviews.comments: Never left in hand, food always delicious.

reviews.name: Daniela
reviews.comments: Very good sandwich! I've ordered several times always good!

reviews.name: Laila
reviews.comments: Best burger I have ever tasted. It will be difficult to get back to mc and bk

reviews.name: Suzana
reviews.comments: My sandwich arrived cold and all disassembled

reviews.name: Eric
reviews.comments: Great option! I recommend!

reviews.name: Amanda
reviews.comments: It took a while and the coffee came frosty

reviews.name: Carla
reviews.comments: Everything perfect. Delivery, packaging, food. Result? Best cost-benefit

reviews.name: Rodrigo
reviews.comments: Very fast delivery, but it is expensive.

reviews.name: André
reviews.comments: Excellent as always!

reviews.name: João
reviews.comments: Great. I made the request with another address and when I saw the error, I called to let them know. The biker cut the whole city and the food still arrived warm (and delicious). I am always asking and recommending

reviews.name: Marcelo
reviews.comments: Arrived very fast, even before the forecast

reviews.name: Fatinha
reviews.comments: I did not like the flavors I ordered and I found the price very high

reviews.name: Lucas
reviews.comments: Waiting 1: 45hr to receive the order is UNACCEPTABLE

reviews.name: Jacira
reviews.comments: Came OK!

reviews.name: Ana
reviews.comments: Fast and always a delight !! I asked 3x and it always came fast and everything right.

reviews.name: Larissa
reviews.comments: The delivery rate could be cheaper.

reviews.name: Jarbas
reviews.comments: Excellent and arrived very fast!

reviews.name: Rafaela
reviews.comments: Arrived fast and perfect!

reviews.name: Julia
reviews.comments: I always liked the requests that I made, but this time it sucked and disappointed a lot. It took 30min more to arrive than the maximum expected time.

reviews.name: Marília
reviews.comments: Delivery rate quite high and need to put in app if person wants additional portion of something (syrup, crunchy etc)
